body: The News Master is reporting that "the news heads of state run television stations: SLRC (Sri Lanka Rupavahini) & ITN (Independent Television Network) have received strict orders from the government hierarchy to 'filter' news reports received from Egypt."
original_body: The News Master is reporting that "the news heads of state run television stations: SLRC (Sri Lanka Rupavahini) & ITN (Independent Television Network) have received strict orders from the government hierarchy to 'filter' news reports received from Egypt."
title: Sri Lanka: State Media to Censor News From Egypt
